spatial_accuracy.notes: Severe inversion of the floor plan layout. The garage is attached to the side wall instead of being detached. Room sequence is mirrored or incorrectly mapped relative to the entry.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing the specific separate WC and Laundry zones. Wall topology does not match the 2D compartmentalization. Door placements are largely hallucinated.

furniture_mapping.notes: Generic furniture used; kitchen counters and appliances are missing or replaced by abstract shapes. Car is floating/attached to an exterior wall.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good lighting and isometric camera angle, but structural distortions (like the car on the wall) significantly detract from visual clarity.

detected_errors.description: Missing Laundry room, separate WC room, and Balcony.
Garage merged into the main structure incorrectly; car is placed on a vertical wall.
Entry hallway proportion is stretched and distorted compared to the 2D plan.
Hallucinated green partition wall in the kitchen/living area not present in plan.
Rendering artifact: Car geometry is clipping through or mounted to the exterior side wall.
